title: Businessweek Talks with UPS CEO David Abney
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks with UPS CEO David Abney
description:
UPS Chief Executive Officer David Abney discusses looking towards Sunday delivery to compete with Federal Express. He also said if the U.S.-China trade spat doesn’t end, there could be a permanent change in the supply chain.Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
